Packagecom.crazyfm.extension.starlingApp.initializer.models
Classpublic class StarlingInitializerContext
InheritanceStarlingInitializerContext Context ModelContainer Model HierarchyObject SignalDispatcher Disposable Object

Context that configures and launches new Starling instance. Dispatches signals: StarlingInitializerSignal.STARLING_INITIALIZED

Constructor Detail
StarlingInitializerContext()Constructor
public function StarlingInitializerContext(stage:Stage, rootClass:Class, properties:StarlingProperties = null)

Creates IContext, that configures and launches new Starling instance.

Parameters
stage:Stage — The Flash (2D) stage.
 
rootClass:Class — A subclass of 'starling.display.DisplayObject'. It will be created as soon as initialization is finished and will become the first child of the Starling stage. Pass null if you don't want to create a root object right away. (You can use the rootClass property later to make that happen).
 
properties:StarlingProperties (default = null)
Method Detail
dispose()method
override public function dispose():void

Disposes object and removes all children models and views, but doesn't dispose them.
